name: @jsnodor/form-lib
description: A library to create html forms from schema like objects in javascript (inpired by you know which framework).

scripts.build: npm run clean; tsc --build tsconfig-commonjs.json && tsc --build tsconfig-es6.json && webpack
scripts.test:examples: npm run build && npm run examples

author: Dalitso Sakala <https://dalitsosakala.github.io>
